verbs.description: The day after [V: losing] [ARG1: a bid to become the Republican candidate for the Senate in West Virginia] , [ARG0: Don Blankenship] penned a lengthy letter to President Trump that accuses the president of spreading " fake news " that hurt Blankenship 's campaign .
